data.text:
The Fairy Baby $20

Starting in 1969 Port Arthur, Kit narrates her own story with honesty, innocence and the gradual understanding of difficult truths.

An incomprehensible occurrence at age 14 shapes Kit, her family, and her friends over the next 50 years.

Set against a backdrop of family secrets and misunderstandings, Kit survives lies and losses with the guidance of Raggedybooks, a mentally ill homeless man.

Available for purchase at

Entershine Bookshop

196 Algoma Street South

Thunder Bay, Ontario

807-343-9109

The Wolf of River Terrace $15

In a feel-good story for all ages, three brothers unravel a mystery that straddles two worlds. Who is the strange vanishing girl they have glimpsed in the forest? How is she connected to the misplaced and misunderstood Wolf of River Terrace? To answer these questions, the boys summon all their courage and talents to save both the wolf and the girl. In doing so they learn of hope, trust, and the ties that bind.

Available for purchase at

Entershine Bookshop

196 Algoma Street South

Thunder Bay, Ontario

807-343-9109
